title: EU pushes for Balkan expansion
text:
EU pushes for Balkan expansion 9:55am EST - 01:56 
Twelve EU countries are set to push for the western Balkans to be incorporated into the bloc as soon as possible. But Reuters has taken a look at why that might be easier said than done. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Twelve EU countries are set to push for the western Balkans to be incorporated into the bloc as soon as possible. But Reuters has taken a look at why that might be easier said than done.
